name: Dis/Assemble The Game
description:
Experiment #70 doesn't when he was created, nor where, nor by whom. He only knows his creator locked him in an abandoned warehouse, tasked him with finding a way out, and gave him the power to create matter from none and disintegrate things into nothingness... but never both.

Dis/Assemble is a puzzle-platformer where you have the choice whether to create or destroy your way to the goal. The catch? You can only pick one, and you can only do it once.
